name: notifications-control
description: Notification dropdown control with real-time updates, infinite scroll, and light/dark theme support (Tailwind variant)
author: Replyke

files.description: Main notification dropdown control with positioning (Tailwind)
Notification list with infinite scroll, loading and empty states (Tailwind)
Individual notification item with avatar, icon, and actions (Tailwind)
Type-based notification icon with theme-aware colors (Tailwind)
Utility functions for time formatting and text truncation
